item.description:
Hello, it's Josh, how are you? 

Spend a little time and experience African Dance, enjoy ice-cold refreshments and delicious appetizers  and meet new people who share your values.

 

This fun fundraising experience benefits kids in Ghana. Ellie of Cultural Collaborative commits her life to helping kids learn valuable life educational lessons so these kids can be self sufficient and educated.

Learn more: http://culturalcollaborative.org/
Buy tickets or learn more: wepay.com/events/fundraiser-for-kids-in-ghana

We will be volunteering with friends from the Boston Volunteers

Learn more or discover who else is coming: http://www.meetup.com/bigenoughtodeliver/

 

More info to come.

 

Spend a little time and experience African Dance, meet interesting new people and help kids. What's better than that!?!

 

Josh

P.S. Learn more or discover who else is coming: http://www.meetup.com/bigenoughtodeliver/
item.how_to_find_us: We will be the popular group standing next to the door. I will provide my cell # closer to the time of the celebration
item.name: African Dance, ice-cold drinks and refreshments. Fun Fundraiser. Learn more...
